snippet: From Oct. 23 through 26, Newark is to play host to a biennial event that this year will feature 120 readings, panel discussions, Q. and A. sessions and former poet laureates Rita Dove, Robert Pinsky and Billy Collins.
abstract: Geraldine R Dodge Poetry Festival, biennial literary bonanza held in downtown Newark, will feature 120 readings, panel discussions and question sessions, along with former poet laureates (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: From Oct. 23 through 26, Newark is to play host to a biennial event that this year will feature 120 readings, panel discussions, Q. and A. sessions and former poet laureates Rita Dove, Robert Pinsky and Billy Collins.

headline.seo: Geraldine R. Dodge Poetry Festival Celebrates the Art of Verse
headline.main: Poetry Takes the Stage, No Rehearsal Required
headline.print_headline: Poetry Takes the Stage, No Rehearsal Required
